p:
The highest-ranked model for D. viscosa was the base model, with a moderately strong model weight (w
i = 0.52; Table in S6 Table). The second-ranking model contributed substantially to account for most of the remaining weight among those in the model suite (w
i = 0.42), which included the negative influence of soil moisture on seedling growth. The random effect of plot explained 8.3% of model variation (ICC = 0.083) in the base model.
